The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
Welcome to the latest BSG newsletter!
In this edition, we take a look at all the events and activities from Chinese New Year, which include the ever-popular dragon dances.
As well as coverage of all the cultural fun, we have updates from each phase, with Minecraft Maths, cat caper newspapers, inter-house challenges and a report on our first successful Careers Fair.
We hope you enjoy this edition.
For the downloadable version, please CLICK HERE.
Kind regards,
Stuart Geraghty
Publications Editor & Librarian
